text.div:
HSPC Special Arrangement value set

The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.

Copyright Statement: Intermountain Healthcare HDD

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-specialArrangement defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
182850 WheelchairA device, comprising a chair with wheels, used for individuals that cannot walk.
528123036 InterpreterAn individual that translates spoken language to a language that is understood by the receiver.
182847 StretcherA device used to convey an individual from one place to another where the individual is in a lying position and is carried by others.
528123037 Seeing eye dogA canine that has been trained to lead an idividual that is blind.
30719 OxygenA suuplimental substance given to patients who cannot obtain appropriate level of environmental oxygen through natural breathing.
528123038 Heart monitorA device that monitors an idividual's heart rate.

name: HSPC Special Arrangement value set
description: The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.

concept.definition: A device, comprising a chair with wheels, used for individuals that cannot walk.
An individual that translates spoken language to a language that is understood by the receiver.
A device used to convey an individual from one place to another where the individual is in a lying position and is carried by others.
A canine that has been trained to lead an idividual that is blind.
A suuplimental substance given to patients who cannot obtain appropriate level of environmental oxygen through natural breathing.
A device that monitors an idividual's heart rate.
